    JWEEncryptionProvider.encodeJwe(JWE jwe)
    This method usually has 3 outputs: - generated initialization vector - encrypted content - authenticationTag for MAC validation It is supposed to call setEncryptedContentInfo(byte[], byte[], byte[]) after it's finished
